channel.title: Jihan Wu on ₿itcoin Transcripts
channel.description: Recent content in Jihan Wu on ₿itcoin Transcripts

item.title: Google Tech Talk (2016)
item.description: Bitcoin Google Tech Talk Okay so maybe we will start. Thank you for coming. We have about 25 folks here from the Bitcoin community, both miners and Core developers. Don’t know exactly what the definition of a Core developer is, but I guess I know one when I see one. So anyway, we’re lucky here to have Jihan Wu. He’s the co-founder of Bitmain, a leading Chinese bitcoin technology company and mining pool.
